SELECT
'碎矿' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT = '小皮带轮轴承有无异响' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT = '小皮带轮轴承温度' THEN Result END ) as 'a2', -- MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT = '小皮带轮和皮带有无打滑现象' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT = '大皮带轮和皮带有无打滑现象' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '传动皮带有无断裂%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '拉杆弹簧%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT = '动颚齿板是否磨损' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '动颚齿板及衬板%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a7', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '动颚轴运转%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a8', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT = '偏心轴运转有无异响' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a9', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT = '偏心轴轴瓦温度' THEN Result END ) as 'a10', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '油箱油位%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a11', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '油箱内油质%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a12', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '油泵运转%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a13', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT = '油泵供油压力' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a14', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '回油磁网%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a15', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '冷却器%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a16', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '供回油管%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a17', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT = '低压油站油箱温度' THEN Result END ) as 'a18' FROM (SELECT SC_CONTENT,RESULT, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) THEN '故障' WHEN (ALTPID = 0) THEN '正常' WHEN (ALTPID=1 OR ALTPID=2) THEN CONCAT(RESULT,'故障') ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult
FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (DEPT_NAME="碎矿设备" AND devName="简摆颚式破碎机") AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as tmp

SELECT
'生产' as 'devName',
MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT = '三角皮带磨损情况' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '动颚润滑%' THEN Result END ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '前后肘板%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT = '小皮带轮轴承有无异响' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a4',
MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '干油管%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '颚破冷却水%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT LIKE '颚破机%' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a7', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT = '地脚是否松动' THEN tempResult END ) as 'a8', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='破碎过程' AND SC_CONTENT = '破碎过程是否正常' THEN Result END ) as 'a9'
FROM (SELECT SC_CONTENT,RESULT,SC_PART, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) THEN '故障' WHEN (ALTPID = 0) THEN '正常' WHEN (ALTPID=1 OR ALTPID=2) THEN CONCAT(RESULT,'故障') ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult
FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (DEPT_NAME="碎矿生产" AND devName="简摆颚式破碎机") AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as tmp

SELECT '电仪' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN devName="简摆颚式破碎机电机" AND SC_CONTENT ='测振' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN devName="简摆颚式破碎机电机" AND SC_CONTENT ='测温' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN devName="简摆颚式破碎机电机" AND SC_CONTENT ='有无异常' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN devName="简摆颚式破碎机电机" AND SC_CONTENT ='有无松动' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN devName="颚破稀油站1号油泵电机" AND SC_CONTENT ='测振' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN devName="颚破稀油站1号油泵电机" AND SC_CONTENT ='测温' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN devName="颚破稀油站1号油泵电机" AND SC_CONTENT ='有无异常' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a7', MAX(CASE WHEN devName="颚破稀油站1号油泵电机" AND SC_CONTENT ='有无松动' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a8', MAX(CASE WHEN devName="颚破稀油站2号油泵电机" AND SC_CONTENT ='测振' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a9', MAX(CASE WHEN devName="颚破稀油站2号油泵电机" AND SC_CONTENT ='测温' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a10', MAX(CASE WHEN devName="颚破稀油站2号油泵电机" AND SC_CONTENT ='有无异常' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a11', MAX(CASE WHEN devName="颚破稀油站2号油泵电机" AND SC_CONTENT ='有无松动' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a12' FROM ( SELECT SC_CONTENT,devName, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN (SC_CONTENT="测振" OR SC_CONTENT="测温") THEN RESULT WHEN (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) THEN '故障' WHEN (ALTPID = 0) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult, RESULT
FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (DEPT_NAME="电仪工段" AND (devName="简摆颚式破碎机电机" OR devName="颚破稀油站1号油泵电机" OR devName="颚破稀油站2号油泵电机")) AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as temp
